title: Fix logo placement and positioning in Navigation and Home components

requirements.text: Update frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx to reposition the logo image with proper spacing and alignment, ensuring it displays to the left of the 'CareerSphere' text with adequate margin (e.g., mr-2 or mr-3) and maintains vertical centering with the text

quotes: No logo is not placed correctly

acceptanceCriteria: Logo image appears immediately to the left of 'CareerSphere' text in the navigation header
Logo and text are vertically aligned and centered together
Appropriate horizontal spacing (margin-right) exists between logo and text
Logo maintains responsive sizing: h-8 w-8 on mobile, h-10 w-10 on tablet/desktop
Logo displays correctly on mobile, tablet, and laptop screen sizes

requirements.text: Update frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx hero section to reposition the logo image with proper layout structure, ensuring it displays centered above the 'CareerSphere' title with adequate spacing (e.g., mb-4 or mb-6) and maintains visual hierarchy in the hero section

quotes: No logo is not placed correctly

acceptanceCriteria: Logo image appears centered above the 'CareerSphere' title in the hero section
Adequate vertical spacing exists between logo and title text
Logo maintains responsive sizing: h-16 w-16 on mobile, h-20 w-20 on tablet, h-24 w-24 on desktop
Visual hierarchy is clear with logo, title, and tagline properly spaced
Logo displays correctly and is centered on all screen sizes

requirements.text: Verify the logo image file exists at frontend/public/assets/logo.png (or frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.png if generated) and is correctly referenced in both Navigation.tsx and Home.tsx with proper src attributes using absolute paths starting with /assets/

quotes: No logo is not placed correctly

acceptanceCriteria: Logo file exists at the correct path in frontend/public/assets/
Both Navigation.tsx and Home.tsx reference the logo using correct absolute path
Logo image loads without 404 errors in browser developer console
Logo displays in production deployment at the .ic0.app URL

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, or useActor.ts
Do not modify files in frontend/src/components/ui directory
Maintain existing logo alt text 'CareerSphere Logo' for accessibility
Preserve existing responsive breakpoints and Tailwind CSS utility classes
nonGoals: Changing logo dimensions or aspect ratio
Changing navigation menu structure or links
Altering hero section content beyond logo positioning
